title: Is Meryl Streep Applewood Roman Polanski at the Academy Awards?
subtitle: A video showing Meryl Streep applause to Roman Polanski at the Academy Awards in 2003 came in the introduction after the controversial actress 2017 Golden Globes.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: Meryl Streep Broman Polanski paid tribute to the Academy Awards in 2003.
